products.title: Zambezi 25mm Anthracite Grey Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A bold dark grey shade, this zambezi anthracite perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Grey shades are not only clean and trend-setting, but can be either complimented with co-ordinating accessories, or can be the background to a more bolder colour palette. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit Anthracite Frame
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Anthracite Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: The deep anthracite grey slat is a 'statement neutral', drawing the eye as a key furnishing, while still pairing smartly with all colour schemes. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the most simple shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles. Matching the ral 7016 code, you can be sure this will match your new bifold doors perfectly.

products.title: Rainbow 25mm Anthracite Grey T1679 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finish venetian blinds, available in a full spectrum of colour. This matt grey venetian blind is the perfect choice to add colour and warmth to any room in your home. See their perfect fit venetian collection - this slat is colour match for the anthracite frame available now. Product id: db-nfven0004 fabric colour: anthracite grey t1679 material: aluminium headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips - co-ordinating cords slat width: 25mm control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
